Package Model.entities

Class Dashboard

java.lang.Object
Model.entities.Dashboard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable
public class Dashboard extends Object implements Iterable
Class used to represent the dashboard

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Dashboard()
    Construct an empty dashboard and the taps matrix The dimension and structure are set before the game

      Construct an empty dashboard and the taps matrix The dimension and structure are set before the game

  • Method Details

    • getRows

      public int getRows()
      Returns:
      the number of rows of the dashboard

    • getColumns

      public int getColumns()
      Returns:
      the number of columns of the dashboard

    • canWithdraw

      public boolean canWithdraw(List<PlanarCoordinate> coordinateList)
      Given a list of coordinates return true only if all coordinates have a card and at least a side of the card is free, so if each card in the list is withdrawable
      Parameters:
      coordinateList - is a list that contains coordinates
      Returns:
      true if the selected cards are withdrawable, false otherwise

    • withdraw

      public List<Card> withdraw(List<PlanarCoordinate> coordinateList)
      Given a list of coordinates it removes the cards from the dashboard If you want to withdraw is better to check if all coordinates are correct using canWithdraw
      Parameters:
      coordinateList - is a list that contains coordinates
      Returns:
      the list of card withdrawn

    • needsRefill

      public boolean needsRefill()
      It checks if the dashboard needs to be filled or not The dashboard needs refill when the player can withdraw only one card
      Returns:
      true if the refill is needed, false otherwise

    • refill

      public void refill(Bag bag) throws InvalidActionException
      Draws cards from the bag and then put them in the dashboard until the bag is empty or the dashboard is filled
      Parameters:
      bag - is the bag from where to draw the cards
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - on invalid action

    • isCellAvailable

      public boolean isCellAvailable(PlanarCoordinate planarCoordinate)
      Checks if the coordinate given is inside the dashboard and if the cell is usable
      Parameters:
      planarCoordinate - is a single coordinate
      Returns:
      true if the coordinate is inside the dashboard and usable, false otherwise

    • checkCell

      public Card checkCell(PlanarCoordinate planarCoordinate) throws InvalidArgumentException
      Checks if the coordinate given is inside the dashboard and what card is inside it
      Parameters:
      planarCoordinate - is a single coordinate
      Returns:
      the card that is in the selected dashboard coordinate, null if there is none
      Throws:
      InvalidArgumentException - on invalid argument

    • asMatrix

      public Card[][] asMatrix()
      Return the dashboard actual situation as a matrix
      Returns:
      array of cards with the actual state of the dashboard
